snippet: After Cathy Choi accepted her father’s offer to join Bulbrite, a lighting maker, she decided to let its employees decide on its corporate standards.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Bulbrite president Cathy Choi discussing her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: After Cathy Choi accepted her father’s offer to join Bulbrite, a lighting maker, she decided to let its employees decide on its corporate standards.

headline.print_headline: It’s Not About Me. It’s About Our Company Values.
headline.seo: Cathy Choi of Bulbrite, on Letting Workers Set Values
headline.main: It’s Not About Me. It’s About Our Company Values.
